questions.question: In this term of binomial expansion of 6c2 a^2 b^4. which of these is the binomial coefficient

explanations.b: Binomial coefficeint is the constant part of product that any element in any binomial expansion is multiplied with.

questions.question: For what value of r does the binomial coefficient 7cr have the value 21

explanations.c: the value of ncr is same as nc(n-r).

questions.question: if we add the values of second column third row in pascal's triangle for (a+b)^n and (b+c)^n, we get

explanations.c: pascal's triangle only has binomial coefficients and not the individual elements of a binomial expansion
